statement: E. Lomsat gelraltime limit per test2 secondsmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstandard inputoutputstandard outputYou are given a rooted tree with root in vertex1. Each vertex is coloured in some colour.Let's call colourcdominating in the subtree of vertexvif there are no other colours that appear in the subtree of vertexvmore times than colourc.
